javadiptraceasciilib

Class DiptraceGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • javadiptraceasciilib.DiptraceGraphics

  • public final class DiptraceGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
    Draw a schematics or a pcb on a Java Graphics2D object. Note that there may be a slight difference between the graphics produced by Diptrace and the graphics produced by this class. The content is the same, but the size of some shapes may differ slight and the fonts may differ.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Should the other side of the PCB be visible?
